name: Sona Mukhe Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Sona Mukhe Recipe: Eggs 3 well beaten Desiccated coconut 2 cups Milk powder 3 cups Coconut milk 1 tin Water 2 cups Semolina 1 cup Sugar 1 Â½ cup Vanilla essence 1 tsp Yellow color pinch Ghee 1 cup Almond and pistachio 2 tbsp each
instructions: In 3 cups milk powder, mix 2 cup water, coconut milk, yellow color, sugar, suji and ghee. Also mix the desiccated coconut and well beaten eggs. Know put to cook , on low flame, staring all the time, when its get the thick, and ghee separated, put it on a grease dish, spread well, sprinkle with chopped almond and pistachio. Bake in a pre heated oven for 15 min in 180 degrees.
